page.title: 02TRANSPORT:ST.WENN SCHOOL BUS
page.content: Buses are our{public transport}in St.Wenn area. They run on diesel oil and have four or six wheels.Mr Chapman owns an old bus.Its garage is in the village of{Rosenannon}.Mr Chapman drives it every school day. The bus is light blue and grey.{It {is the only kind working in Great {Britain.}Mr Chapman's bus is thirty six years old.It is an Austin built in 1949.It is quite small.We estimate it could carry about twelve people. The maximum speed is fifty m.p.h. It usually travels at about twenty m.p.h. around our small lanes. There is a bus service that goes to Bodmin,the nearest big town.It passes through our locality on its way to Bodmin.It takes the Secondary school children to the nearest comprehensive school.
